title: Commission Decision of 27 October 2010 on the appointment of members of the Scientific, Technical and Economic Committee for Fisheries and the establishment of a reserve list
header:
28.10.2010 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 292/3
COMMISSION DECISION
of 27 October 2010
on the appointment of members of the Scientific, Technical and Economic Committee for Fisheries and the establishment of a reserve list
2010/C 292/04
THE EUROPEAN COMMISSION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 2371/2002 of 20 December 2002 on the conservation and sustainable exploitation of fisheries resources under the Common Fisheries Policy (1), and in particular Article 33(1) thereof,
Having regard to Commission Decision 2005/629/EC of 26 August 2005 establishing a Scientific, Technical and Economic Committee for Fisheries (STECF) (2),
Whereas:
(1) The STECF members appointed by the Commission on 1 November 2007 will reach the end of their three-year term of office on 31 October 2010.
(2) New full-time members for the plenary of the STECF should therefore be appointed for a period of three years from 1 November 2010.
(3) A reserve list valid from 1 November 2010 should be drawn up,
main_body:
Appointment of the members of the Scientific, Technical and Economic Committee for Fisheries
In accordance with Article 3(1) and Article 6(1) of Decision 2005/629/EC, the Commission hereby appoints the persons listed in Annex 1 as members of the Scientific, Technical and Economic Committee for Fisheries from 1 November 2010.

Establishment of a reserve list
In accordance with Article 4(4) of Commission Decision 2005/629/EC, the Commission hereby establishes a reserve list, annexed to this Decision, with suitable candidates to replace members who leave the STECF in accordance with Article 6(3) of that Decision.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 October 2010.
For the Commission
The President
José Manuel BARROSO
(1)  OJ L 358, 31.12.2002, p. 59.
(2)  OJ L 225, 31.8.2005, p. 18. Corrected by OJ L 316, 2.12.2005, p. 23.
